/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC -O3 -DNDEBUG -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/image_common/image_transport/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/pluginlib/lib -pthread   -shared -Wl,-soname,libusb_cam.so -o ../../../lib/libusb_cam.so CMakeFiles/usb_cam.dir/usb_cam.o -L/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/image_common/image_transport/lib -L/opt/ros/fuerte/lib -L/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/pluginlib/lib -limage_transport -lpoco_lite -lboost_fs_wrapper -ltinyxml -lroslib -lmessage_filters -lroscpp -lrostime -lrosconsole -lroscpp_serialization -lxmlrpcpp -lavcodec -lswscale -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/image_common/image_transport/lib:/opt/ros/fuerte/lib:/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/pluginlib/lib
